TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit NotFiniteNumberException extends System.ArithmeticException

summary.span: 当浮点值为正无穷大、负无穷大或非数字 (NaN) 时引发的异常。

span.span: The exception that is thrown when a floating-point value is positive infinity, negative infinity, or Not-a-Number (NaN).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅供在浮点操作中不支持的无穷大和非数字概念的编程语言。 is available for programming languages that do not support the concepts of infinity and Not-a-Number in floating-point operations. 使用 HRESULT COR_E_NOTFINITENUMBER，其值 0x80131528。 uses the HRESULT COR_E_NOTFINITENUMBER, which has the value 0x80131528. 有关的实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructors.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

public: NotFiniteNumberException();

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数初始化为系统提供的消息的描述错误，如"号遇到了不是有限的数量。"的新实例的属性This constructor initializes the property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "The number encountered was not a finite quantity." 此消息将当前系统区域性考虑在内。This message takes into account the current system culture. 下表显示 的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|“值”Value| |--------------|-----------| ||空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 `Nothing`）。A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| ||本地化的错误消息字符串。The localized error message string.|

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the invalid number.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `offendingNumber`参数必须同时是和数无效。The `offendingNumber` parameter must be both a and an invalid number. 下表显示 的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|“值”Value| |--------------|-----------| ||空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 `Nothing`）。A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| ||无效数字。The invalid number.|

summary.span: 用序列化数据初始化 类的新实例。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数在反序列化过程中调用，以便重建通过流传输的异常对象。This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.

param.name: innerException

span.span: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.

param.span: 如果 innerException 参数不是空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 ），则在处理内部异常的 块中引发当前异常。

span.span: If the innerException parameter is not a null reference ( in Visual Basic), the current exception is raised in a block that handles the inner exception.

summary.span: 使用指定错误消息和对作为此异常的根本原因的内部异常的引用来初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is root cause of this exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因前一个异常而直接引发的异常可以在 属性中包含对前一个异常的引用。An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception can include a reference to the previous exception in the property. 属性返回的值与传递到构造函数中的值相同；或者，如果 `null` 属性没有向构造函数提供内部异常值，则为 。The property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor. 下表显示 的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|“值”Value| |--------------|-----------| ||内部异常引用。The inner exception reference.| ||错误消息字符串。The error message string.|

MemberSignature.Value: public double OffendingNumber { get; }
.property instance float64 OffendingNumber
Public ReadOnly Property OffendingNumber As Double
public: property double OffendingNumber { double get(); };

summary.span: 获取无效数字，它可以是正无穷大、负无穷大或非数字 (NaN)。

span.span: Gets the invalid number that is a positive infinity, a negative infinity, or Not-a-Number (NaN).
The invalid number.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回相同的值与传递到构造函数，或提供零如果没有值。The property returns the same value as was passed into the constructor, or zero if no value was supplied. 重写属性可自定义的内容或无效的值的格式。Override the property to customize the content or format of the invalid value. 此属性是只读的。This property is read-only.
